# Schoolera 2026 - School Management System (Algeria)

Schoolera is a premium, all-in-one desktop school management software designed for private schools, institutes, and training centers in Algeria and the Arab world.

## Key Information
- **URL**: https://schoolera.site
- **Pricing**: 50,000 DZD (Lifetime License, One-time payment).
- **Target Market**: Algeria (Primary), Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Gulf countries.
- **Offline Capability**: Works 100% offline (No internet required for core management).

## Core Features
- **Automated WhatsApp Integration**: Instant notifications for attendance, fees, and certificates.
- **Financial Management**: Complete tracking of revenues, expenses, and invoices.
- **Student & Teacher Portals**: Biometric ID cards, attendance, and course management.
- **Document Generation**: Professional school certificates and registration forms.
- **Auto-Backup**: Incremental local database protection.
